casebody.data:
No. 10-8502. Carlos Portalatin, Petitioner v. Harold Graham, Superintendent, Auburn Correctional Facility. 562 U.S. 1304, 131 S. Ct. 1693,

179 L. Ed. 2d 646,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2180. March 21, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 624 F.3d 69.
